description:
**Fix Overview**:

To manage Windows 10 upgrade processes effectively within an Active Directory (AD) environment:

1. Create an AD machine group specifically for Windows 10 systems instead of relying on individual Organizational Units (OUs).
2. Utilize this machine group to filter updates and upgrades.
3. Monitor the group; when Windows 10 machines are upgraded and removed, the associated machine group will automatically be purged.

**Details**:
This method streamlines the upgrade management process and ensures that only relevant systems are targeted for updates, reducing administrative overhead. (LLM Synthesized)
